summary.p: This module requires the service of mod_proxy. It provides support for the proxying FTP sites.
Thus, in order to get the ability of handling FTP proxy requests, mod_proxy and mod_proxy_ftp have to be present in the server.

note.title: Warning
note.p: Do not enable proxying until you have secured your server. Open proxy servers are dangerous both to your network and to the Internet at large.
